fields.summary: OSG stays in BROKEN state for 15+ minutes on restart

fields.description:
During the very recent 4.0.1 QA runs we've been seeing systems where the storage controller does not transition from 'not-ready' to enabled. 
From some brief debugging on my system today with [~zhill] and [~swathi] it looked the SC originally reports that it can't transition because the storage provider is not set, however once the property is set, and the SC is able to fetch the property the CLC continues to show the SC in 'not-ready' state. 
Attempting to manually modify the SC service state did not work, restarting the SC service does work. 
In my multi-cluster topo both SCs were stuck in this state restarting the SC in PARTI01 recovered it. [~zhill] manually modified the service from 'not-ready' to 'stopped' to 'enabled' and that also worked. 
Note this is a mixed hypervisor (vmware/kvm) multi-cluster env. 

Thanks, 
-Matt
fields.summary: Remote java componets failing to transition from 'not-ready'

comments.body:
Changing title from 'storage controllers' to 'java components as I'm now seeing this with the broker and have heard others are seeing this with OSG. 
The following logs may be relevant as they are repeated during this failure...

Marked 'in QA' and assigned to [~sjones] since he did the fix for EUCA-9722. Fix for EUCA-9722 should be sufficient here. If not, [~mclark], please re-open and I can investigate further.

Closing per fix in EUCA-9722. I have not seen this in the recent testing.
